alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 9:41AM CST until February 22 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Sabine River Near Deweyville Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River near White Oak Park. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 2.0 feet, Minor flooding of Goos Ferry Road will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:40 AM CST Friday the stage was 1.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 2.2 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 2.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Calcasieu River White Oak Park 2.0 1.9 Fri 8 am CST 1.9 1.9 1.9 &&
